pullRequest.title: [miio] Add discovery from cloud feature.
pullRequest.bodyText:
This allows to discover things that are not directly on the same subnet
Implements feature of #7276
Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen marcel@verpaalen.com

commit.message:
[miio] Add discovery from cloud feature.

This allows to discover things that are not directly on the same subnet

Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen <marcel@verpaalen.com>

nodes.bodyText: If there is change this would be modified by multiple threads the you should use ConcurrentHashMap instead.

commit.message:
[miio] update based on review

Co-authored-by: Connor Petty <mistercpp2000@gmail.com>
Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen <marcel@verpaalen.com>

nodes.bodyText: Please do proper null checks instead of just catching the NullPointerException.

commit.message:
[miio] update based on code review

Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen <marcel@verpaalen.com>

[miio] avoid dead code warning

Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen <marcel@verpaalen.com>

nodes.bodyText: Is it guaranteed that id is an integer at this point? You make no attempt to catch the NumberFormatException that this would throw. If you know that it is an integer why not have the id passed as a long parameter instead?

commit.message:
[miio] safe conversions did
